name: Association of Bulgarian IR Directors
memberOrga: The Association of Bulgarian Investor Relations Directors is a non-profit organization, representing more than 120 Bulgarian IR Directors and other natural person and legal entities engaged with information disclosure and transparency.
goal:
The Association of Bulgarian Investor Relations Directors is a non-profit organization, representing more than 120 Bulgarian IR Directors, incorporated with the following
objectives: Align and consolidate the interests of its members and assist investment relations directors
in fulfilling their duties; Compliance with capital markets and corporate laws and regulations with respective EU
regulations; Propose laws and regulations related to the development of the activities of the Association; Defend the rights and interests of Association members to the financial supervision regulatory bodies and all other participants in the capital markets - individuals and institutions. International relational with other IR Associations worldwide, coordination of a best practices in IR, GC and ESG.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, International co-operation and development
euInitiatives: Participation in the consultation on the implementation of the EU legislation; harmonizing the Bulgarian capital market legislation with the EU Directives; preparation of legal statements, recommendations, draft bylaws addressed to the Bulgarian authorities regarding the implementation of the  EU legislation
